title: Keypad Layout Window Manager for Mac
author: janten
content: readme.md keypad layoutcontrol window layout using ctrl + numeric keypad macos. press number keys a row while holding down ctrl select new window frame a 3x3 grid.installationhomebrew users simply brew cask install keypad-layout. compiled versions are available download releases.examplesctrl +result1 9full screen7 9top row1 3bottom row3 1bottom row8 3right thirdsreference you a macbook forgot layout the numeric keypad, refer the table below the grid layout. 7 8 9 4 5 6 1 2 3 attributions application menu bar icons are derived numpad ján slobodník the noun project, available under creative commons attribution license.
